name: Delay The Inevitable - Procrastination Simulator (LD 50)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 in a small team of 2 people because our artist unfortunately had to drop out.

You are the devil on a student's shoulder, keeping her from studying for her exam. Distract her to keep her focus (The bar on the left) low so she doesn't study and get a good grade. You won't be able to keep her focus at zero though, at some point she will inevitably study. Books help her focus while games distract her.

For those who aren't familiar with the American grading system:

You have letters from A to D and then F with A being best and F being worst.  A to D can be followed by a "+" or a "-" to indicate that it is a relatively good or bad grade. F is just F. If you get an F in school, my condolences. If you get an F here, you mastered the game!

We hope you enjoy our first Ludum Dare submission.

Controls:

LEFT ARROW and RIGHT ARROW to move or

A and D to move

SPACE to start a new round
